title: Divya Nakshatra Haaram: Exquisite Diamond and Gemstone Necklace
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Dazzling Pavé-set Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
E-F Color); Natural Rubies (Center and accents) and Emeralds (Drop accents).
features: This stunning Haaram features a traditional South Indian design with a contemporary twist. The intricate filigree work highlights the brilliance of the pavé-set diamonds. Delicate ruby and emerald accents add a touch of regal charm. The central pendant features a larger emerald drop, creating a focal point of elegance. The necklace is designed for comfort and perfect drape.
colors: Primarily gold with shimmering white diamonds
complemented by the deep red of the rubies and vibrant green of the emeralds. The colour combination invokes a sense of celebration and prosperity.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its sophisticated design also makes it suitable for high-end social gatherings and formal events.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern diamond-setting techniques. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. Its unique design makes it a true statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
